mapper.insert: insert into event_test(event_id, member_id, eventname, start_schedule, end_schedule) values(#{eventId}, #{memberId}, #{eventName}, #{start_schedule}, #{end_schedule});
mapper.update: update event_test set eventname=#{eventName}, start_schedule=#{start_schedule}, end_schedule=#{end_schedule} where event_id=#{eventId}
mapper.select: select event_id as eventId, member_id as memberId, eventname as eventName, start_schedule, end_schedule from event where member_id='${arg0}' and DATE(start_schedule)='${arg1}'
select * from event_test where member_id=#{memberId} and DATE_FORMAT(start_schedule,'%m')=#{date.getMonthValue()}
